Title: Imperialism and all reactionary forces are paper tigers
Designer: Eastern Sea is Red naval airforce unit stationed in Shanghai (驻沪海军航空某部东海红)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: This poster, reminiscent of a scene from the Korean War, shows what will happen when the Americans invade China - which they have no intention of doing in these years. On the contrary: in 1971 secret diplomacy between China and the USA starts, leading to Nixon's famous visit to Mao in 1972.
